compliant.section: 您之後也可以依照連結 (https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout?hl=en) 中的指示，選擇退出上述 Google 功能所進行的追蹤，或此類其他廣告商或網站的活動。
compliant.legal provisions: Right to withdraw consent; Right to object to processing based on legitimate interests (including profiling)

compliant.section: 如果您不希望收到任何按興趣顯示的廣告，或不希望將您的個人資料提供給第三方廣告商，您可在廣告網路服務變更設定。
compliant.legal provisions: Right to object to processing based on legitimate interests (including profiling)

non_compliant.section: Google 可能會在您使用的整個網際網路的網站上顯示我們的廣告。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing, specifically consent; unambiguous and specific consent
non_compliant.amend: This section should clearly state the legal basis for processing (likely consent) and ensure that consent is freely given, specific, informed and unambiguous. It should also specify what data is collected and how it is used for ad personalization.

non_compliant.section: 基於再行銷與受眾訊號機器學習目的，我們還使用一些第三方工具，例如 Google Ads 目標顧客比對。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Information to be provided where personal data have not been obtained from the data subject
non_compliant.amend: The policy should clearly identify all third-party tools used for remarketing and audience signal machine learning, not just mention Google Ads as an example. It should also explain how these tools collect and process data, and what data is shared.

non_compliant.section: 若要進一步瞭解 Google 如何使用目標顧客比對資料， 請參閱： https://support.google.com/google-ads/answer/6334160。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Information to be provided where personal data have not been obtained from the data subject
non_compliant.amend: While linking to Google's page is helpful, the policy should directly explain how Google uses data for Customer Match. Users should not have to navigate away from the privacy policy to understand this processing.

non_compliant.section: 本網站使用 Google AdSense (https://www.google.com/intl/en/policies/privacy/) 提供廣告
non_compliant.amend: The policy should provide more information about Google AdSense than just a link to their privacy policy. It should explain what data Google AdSense collects, how it is used, and for what purposes.

non_compliant.section:
第三方追蹤
我們使用 Cookie 與其他相似追蹤技術，來了解您如何存取及使用我們的網站並收集資訊 (例如，您來自哪個網站)。這可協助我們評估行銷活動有效性。此類網站存取及使用的資料，僅得以匿名形式傳送，並且儲存於我們第三方追蹤服務提供者的伺服器。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Purpose limitation; Transparent information, communication and modalities for the exercise of the rights of the data subject; Information to be provided where personal data are collected from the data subject
non_compliant.amend: The policy needs to be more specific about the 'other similar tracking technologies' used. It should list the specific cookies and trackers, explain their purpose, and offer users a way to manage their cookie preferences. The claim that data is 'anonymized' needs further clarification. If data is truly anonymized, it falls outside GDPR scope. However, if it's pseudonymized, this needs to be stated clearly, along with information about how long data is stored and how users can exercise their rights.
